title: That feel good moment.
body:
When you are getting so good with your new main that in the last three games you got called a booster, a scripter and then a smurf.

in that order.

Tear -> catalyst -> dark seal -> visage -> mejais|roa cass is bae.

Near unkillable early game that rolls into tons of damage late game.

Edit: just saw my kda for said 3 games, 8 8 8. flat 8.00 kda ratio in all three games.

2spook5me

replies.body: That feel good moment when YellowBrickRoad doesn't make a toxic post
that moment you burst someone so fast as veigar you are called a hacker even when your now only 1/5 XD

That feelgood moment when YellowBrickRoad doesn't troll his games.
Seriously dude, been in too many

I wont admit nor deny to having trolled in the past.

But you act like i troll every game.

I flame most games you have me there, and you can tell which games i didnt spend 20 minutes typing in trying to make a crappy player realise they arent good because those are the games i hard carry so hard i redefine the definition of hard, simply because i can devote all of my attention to abusing the mistakes of the enemy team, instead of abusing my team for their mistakes.
Then you realise your still bronze and your trash by default

Didnt you post a comment last week stating that elo was made for chess and is a shitty system to measure skill in a teamgame?

Or do you change your quassi-political viewstance about video games on the regular.

> [{quoted}](name=YellowBrickRoad,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5zgkHtQz,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-05-24T08:42:04.775+0000)
>
> Didnt you post a comment last week stating that elo was made for chess and is a shitty system to measure skill in a teamgame?
> 
> Or do you change your quassi-political viewstance about video games on the regular.

No i was mearly implying that even if you are a god on one champ that people will just go to the old" you are bronze you must be trash." Hence trash by default
Ah lost in translation, thats fair.
That moment when you become so good at a champion (and hence carry hard in the game), that your teammates all send you friend requests after the game xD

Not long ago I played Aurelion Sol, and got myself into a predicament, stuck at low HP between 2 skill shot champions.
I managed to dodge all their abilities, while keeping them both being hit by the stars. which gave me enough time to slip past one of them and Comet-of-legend to safety.

Our Trynd told me I was the best Sol he had ever seen xD
feels good!

It makes up for all those games when I get smashed to hell by Fizz and Yasuo xD
